resources.string: Hold the microphone down to talk
Image of microphone, hold to talk
Image of magnifying glass, press to search for devices
Peer discovery failed. Please make sure Aurora has location permissions.

Connection failed. This could be because: 1. The device denied the connection request. 2. The device has already connected to another device. 3. Technical issues (such as the device moved out of range).
The LOCATION permission must be granted for Aurora to work. Please add this permission in Settings.
Initiating a search will disconnect you from any existing Wi-Fi Direct connection. Are you sure you want to search?
